column1: Q4. Which CNCF Project are you contributing to/representing?
Q5. Where are you based (part of the world)?
Q6. Are you leading any meetup group (if yes - link your meetup group)?
Q7. What is your feeling with respect to your overall experience with CNCF staff, where 10 is completely met expectations and 1 - did not meet expectations? *
Q8. Do you feel that CNCF reached out to collaborate and gather info about your needs? *
Q9. Do you have a good understanding of the resources and programs available to you (i.e., CNCF Speakers Bureau, CNCF Swag Store)?
Q10. Efficiency: Did you feel that the CNCF team responded quickly to your requests? Where 10 is work was completed on time or ahead of schedule and 1 is delayed? *
Q11. Any other feedback that you wish to share, from what CNCF can do more or what we should do less?
